description:
Momo is on her way to the park when she drops the little bell which was a precious gift from her mother.  When Momo doesn`t arrive at the park, Tama decides to go looking for her and hears the sound of Momo`s bell from the sewer, and...
Tama looks up to the sky to see the usual clouds floating by.  But where do clouds come from?  Tora takes Tama and Friends to the place where clouds come from, and there, they find...?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chasing After Momo`s Bell / Grab That Cloud, Tora!
Momo no Suzu o Oikakete / Kumo o Tsukame! Tora
モモの鈴を追いかけて / 雲をつかめ! トラ
